ai-patthana15.71:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously,
ai-patthana15.71:0.3_0: modes and feelings, keeps on doing the feelings,
ai-patthana15.71:1.1_2: Thoughts connected with pleasant feeling. It doesn’t give rise to pleasant feeling. Mindfulness is not a condition for pleasant feeling. Painful feeling ...
ai-patthana15.71:2.1_0: And without feeling arises dependent on a pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana15.71:2.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana15.71:4.1_0: Painful feeling doesn’t give rise to painful feeling, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by painful feeling.
ai-patthana15.71:4.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana15.71:6.1_0: Neutral feeling arises dependent on a neutral feeling. It doesn’t give rise to mental predominance. When there is a cause or condition for feeling, if it doesn’t give rise to pleasant feeling.
